title: NYC Complaints
text: using install_github() works just fine, nicer able just type install.packages("nycomplaints") update.packages("nycomplaints") ordinary way. can using Dirk Eddelbuettel’s drat package. Drat provides convenient way make R aware package repositories CRAN. First, install drat: use drat tell R repository nycomplaints hosted: can now install nycomplaints usual way: ensure nycomplaints repository always available, can add following line .Rprofile .Rprofile.site file: place ’ll able install.packages("nycomplaints") update.packages("nycomplaints") everything work ’d expect. Note drat repository contains data packages CRAN, never danger grabbing wrong version package.
code: if (!require("drat")) {     install.packages("drat")     library("drat") } drat::addRepo("kjhealy") install.packages("nycomplaints") drat::addRepo("kjhealy")
